lead_paragraph: The U.S. Justice Department sent German automaker Volkswagen AG a subpoena under a bank fraud law in its diesel emissions probe, a person briefed on the matter said Tuesday.

headline.main: U.S. Subpoenas Volkswagen Under Bank Fraud Law in Diesel Emissions Probe: Source
headline.print_headline: U.S. Subpoenas Volkswagen Under Bank Fraud Law in Diesel Emissions Probe: Source

snippet: The U.S. Justice Department sent German automaker Volkswagen AG a subpoena under a bank fraud law in its diesel emissions probe, a person briefed on the matter said Tuesday.
